title: DNS Trace Tool
subtitle: Iterative trace from root to authoritative nameservers via DNS over HTTPS

cloudflare.tooltip: Trace DNS resolution path for www.cloudflare.com

google.tooltip: Trace DNS resolution path for www.google.com

github.tooltip: Trace DNS resolution path for github.com

bbc.tooltip: Trace DNS resolution path for bbc.co.uk

aws.tooltip: Trace DNS resolution path for aws.amazon.com

alicia.tooltip: Trace DNS resolution path for aliciasykes.com

loading.title: Performing DNS Trace
loading.message: Following the DNS resolution path from root servers to authoritative nameservers...

step.serverTooltip: DNS server that responded to this query
step.responseTooltip: Response received from the DNS server
step.nodata: No data for this record type

totalTime.label: Total Time
totalTime.tooltip: Total time for the complete DNS trace

dnsQueries.label: DNS Queries
dnsQueries.tooltip: Number of DNS queries performed during trace

finalServer.label: Final Server
finalServer.tooltip: Final authoritative server that provided the answer

recordType.label: Record Type
recordType.tooltip: Type of DNS record that was traced

totalHops.label: Total Hops
totalHops.tooltip: Number of DNS resolution hops from root to authoritative

avgLatency.label: Avg Latency
avgLatency.tooltip: Average response time per DNS query

dnssecStatus.label: DNSSEC Status
dnssecStatus.tooltip: DNSSEC validation status for the final response

authoritative.label: Authoritative
authoritative.tooltip: Whether the final answer came from an authoritative server

resolutionPath.label: Resolution Path
resolutionPath.tooltip: The path taken through different DNS servers

finalAnswer.label: Final Answer
finalAnswer.tooltip: The final answer received from the authoritative server
